description.narrative: The project would contribute to contributing to the survival and development of machine building sector where the country has a comparative advantage, and towards the overall diversification of the economy. The Project will also provide a demonstration effect from of successful installation and use of the modern technology and strengthening JSC Autocrane business practices with special regard to operational efficiency. In addition, the project will directly and indirectly help to sustain more than 5,000 jobs.

name.narrative:
The Company has two main production facilities, both located in frontier regions of Russia:
Avtokran, main production facility in of Ivanovo, Central region, which produces truck mounted cranes with hoisting capacity of up to 100 tons, special chassis truck cranes and slewing rings from 600 to 3,000 mm in diameter. GazpromKran, located in Kamyshin in the Volgograd region, producing cranes with hoisting capacity of 32-50 tons.
